CTASection.content: Hi, I'm Raúl! I focus on creating clean, responsive and functional web apps.

paragraph.text: I started studying web development with the help of The Odin Project.
Learning how to set up a development environment using Ubuntu, how to work with Git with GitHub, then HTML and CSS.

paragraph.subtitle: A formal education
paragraph.text: I enrolled in Acámica’s Full Stack Web Development program in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Where I improved my HTML and CSS skills and learned JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and working with relational and non-relational databases such as MySQL and MongoDB.
In 2020 I completed the Acámica program, I added features and made improvements to projects I’d started and also started learning React.js on my own.

paragraph.subtitle: Thereafter
paragraph.text: I continue to build personal projects, which has allowed me to learn  new technologies and to polish my programming skill set. I've also been doing freelance work building projects for clients.
I'm looking to join a proactive, innovative team filled with empathic people where I can continue growing both personally and professionally.

projects.name: Hacemos Tu Sociedad
projects.summary: Landing page for an attorney providing legal procedures management services, I was in charge of developing the complete user interface.

projects.name: Personal website
projects.summary: The website you're currently seeing! In this project I used React, functional components, Hooks, Context API, Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: GifOS
projects.summary: It's a web app that allows the user to make their own GIFs, search for their favourite ones and get recommendations. I used the GIPHY API and the RecordRTC library.

projects.name: ClasesIN
projects.summary: Development of an e-learning platform's UI, I used HTML, CSS (with SASS as preprocessor) and Vanilla JavaScript.

projects.name: Podcast Channel
projects.summary: Markup for a podcasts website, coded using HTML and CSS.

footerSection.content: Made with React.js, TailwindCSS and a lot of ❤

notFound.content: I'm sorry, we were not able to find that page for you.
